name: Alien planet underwater research sea of horror (ZX Spectrum))
name_original: Alien planet underwater research sea of horror (ZX Spectrum))
description:
Note: This is a prototype version. There will be more changes for this game in future.

In this game you need to explore alien sea and find a portal. To destroy barrier you can find a missile.
68 screens.
Simple treasures exists to increase score.
Unlike first game here there is ending, but I will make second quest too in future. Items exists as secondary quest that allows hero to find out more about deceased civilisation. And to find some of them of them search for hidden walls. And intro starts with slide show of moving boat. This game is much easier because I removed monsters from corners and end of screen unlike first very difficult game.
Controls:
q-up, a-down, o -left, p-right, space - take item, 1- pause, 2- read message (if found), 4- analyse item, b - watch poster (if found), c - shoot missile (if found) to destroy barrier.
